entries.meaning: (countable, uncountable) (A) steak cut from beef cattle.

definitionGroups.group: (countable) Ellipsis of beefsteak plant, also known as perilla and shiso (Perilla frutescens var. crispa).

entries.meaning: (uncountable) The herb prepared from the leaves of the beefsteak plant.

examples: I purchased a half dozen of the healthiest-looking beefsteaks I could find, and tenderly planted the young shoots, using plenty of fertilizer and mulch. I faithfully watered them every day and the little plants quickly shot up to an impressive height.

entries.meaning: (countable, archaic): A celebratory dinner, commonly held in New York between about 1870 and 1940 involving the consumption of enormous quantities of broiled steak and beer.
